Experience Timeline

  1. API Reliability Enhancements

    Backend • 2025

    Implemented transaction replay protection & progressive response evolution while maintaining backward compatibility.

  2. Checkout UX Modernization

    Frontend • 2024

    Migrated legacy Redux to RTK, added guarded routing & optimistic feedback patterns for faster perceived performance.

  3. Mobile Inventory Data Layer

    Android • 2024

    Built normalized SQLite schema with versioned migrations, cascading deletes & parameter-bound queries.
